overview: Crazy Titch, one of the most original and controversial MCs in the scene takes you through his life in the scene in 2004. Follow him through raves, on holiday, to his yard, to the barbers, nothing has been left out as the camera followed him to places other DVDs cannot go. This DVD contains 100% real, raw, live and exclusive footage you will not see on any other underground DVD. Follow one of the realist MCs on road today. It's Crazy time.
title: Crazy Titch – Crazy Times Vol. 1
